title: Ticket #610: Stork jobs can leave queue without a user log entry
description:
A massive file descriptor leak was causing Stork to crash repeatedly at nanohub. About a dozen stork jobs that completed around the time of the crashes left Stork's queue but no entry was written to their user logs. This caused the DAGs they were a part of to stall indefinitely.

The logging code in Stork needs to be reviewed to ensure that jobs that leave the queue always have a log event written.
